mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user (id_email, user_nm, user_pw, gender, ph, postcode, roadAddr, jibunAddr, detailAddr, extraAddr,code) VALUES (#{id_email}, #{user_nm}, #{user_pw}, #{gender} ,#{ph}, #{postcode}, #{roadAddr}, #{jibunAddr}, #{detailAddr}, #{extraAddr}, #{code} )
mapper.select: select i_product, i_user, title, p_nm, p_price, type_sub_title, hit, state,p_img_main, DATE_FORMAT(r_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') as show_time from t_product_sale where i_user = #{i_user} order by i_product desc
